thathwaya barapathala wima arambaune methan sitaya..me ayurin siruru wenas wannata gath nisa, “lassana, awalassana” aadi washayen sankalpa bihiwima arambauni..ahasin gaman kirime, pawime aadi niramisa brahma deha dharinta uruma hakiyawanda ahosi wiya..brahma loka wala men dirghayusha “bhauthika, ghana deha sahithawa” pawathwa gatha nohakiya..mak nisada eewaye saila wayas gatha wana bawini..ghana nowu wishwa siruru aththange siyum saila wayas gatha wanne ithamath semini..me bawata apata aasannayema athi udaharanaya wanne..pruthuwiyen pitatha abhyawakasha madhyasthana wala, “awa-guruthwa” thathwayan yatathe sitina gaganagaminge dehawala wayas gatha wime wegaya adu bawa soya ganimaya..me nisa guruthwakarshanaye sawiyata sawiyata hasu wu ghana siruru athi brahmayanta digu aayusha ahimi wiya..
